item.name: avgEmailLatency
item.description: Difference between the time a message was received by the Barracuda Spam Firewall and the time it is sent to the mail server.

item.name: cpuFanSpeed
item.description: CPU fan speed.

item.name: cpuTemperature
item.description: CPU temperature.

item.name: dailyAllowed
item.description: Total number of inbound messages allowed in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyEncrypted
item.description: Number of messages sent to the Barracuda Message Center for encryption and delivery in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyInboundBlocked
item.description: Total number of inbound messages blocked in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyInboundQuarantined
item.description: Total number of inbound messages quarantined in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyInboundRateControlled
item.description: Total number of inbound messages deferred due to Rate Control in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyInboundTagged
item.description: Total number of inbound messages tagged in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyInboundVirusBlocked
item.description: Total number of inbound messages blocked due to viruses in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyOutboundPolicyBlocked
item.description: Total number of outbound messages blocked due to policy in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyOutboundQuarantined
item.description: Total number of outbound messages quarantined in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyOutboundRateControlled
item.description: Total number of outbound messages deferred due to Rate Control in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyOutboundSpamBlocked
item.description: Total number of outbound messages blocked due to spam in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyOutboundVirusBlocked
item.description: Total number of outbound messages blocked due to viruses in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailyRedirected
item.description: Number of messages redirected to another mail server in the past 24 hours.

item.name: dailySent
item.description: Number of outbound messages delivered to the intended recipient, without modification, in the past 24 hours.

item.name: deferredQueueSize
item.description: Number of messages deferred because they could not be processed, and will be requeued for processing.

item.name: domainCount
item.description: Number of domains configured on the system.

item.name: encryptionEnabled
item.description: A flag that is set if encryption is enabled for at least one domain.

item.name: firmwareStorage
item.description: Amount of disk storage used for various system components.

item.name: hourlyAllowed
item.description: Total number of inbound messages allowed in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyEncrypted
item.description: Number of messages sent to the Barracuda Message Center for encryption and delivery in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyInboundBlocked
item.description: Total number of inbound messages blocked in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyInboundQuarantined
item.description: Total number of inbound messages quarantined in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyInboundRateControlled
item.description: Total number of inbound messages deferred due to Rate Control in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyInboundTagged
item.description: Total number of inbound messages tagged in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyInboundVirusBlocked
item.description: Total number of inbound messages blocked due to viruses in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyOutboundPolicyBlocked
item.description: Total number of outbound messages blocked due to policy in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyOutboundQuarantined
item.description: Total number of outbound messages quarantined in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyOutboundRateControlled
item.description: Total number of outbound messages deferred due to Rate Control in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyOutboundSpamBlocked
item.description: Total number of outbound messages blocked due to spam in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyOutboundVirusBlocked
item.description: Total number of outbound messages blocked due to viruses in the past hour.

item.name: hourlyRedirected
item.description: Number of messages redirected to another mail server in the past hour.

item.name: hourlySent
item.description: Number of outbound messages delivered to the intended recipient, without modification, in the past hour.

item.name: inQueueSize
item.description: Number of messages waiting to be processed by the Barracuda Spam Firewall.

item.name: lastMessageDelivery
item.description: Time and date the last message was delivered by the Barracuda Spam Firewall.

item.name: maillogStorage
item.description: Amount of disk storage used for message and log storage.

item.name: notifyQueueSize
item.description: Count of messages in the notification queue.

item.name: outQueueSize
item.description: Number of messages waiting to be sent to the mail server. Note that alerts and notifications are queued separately from outbound email.

item.name: raidStatus
item.description: The status of the RAID disk array: Fully Operational, Degraded, Rebuilding.

item.name: sysFanSpeed
item.description: System fan speed.

item.name: systemLoad
item.description: Estimate of CPU and disk load on the system.

item.name: totalAllowed
item.description: Total number of inbound messages allowed since last system reset.

item.name: totalEncrypted
item.description: Number of messages sent to the Barracuda Message Center for encryption and delivery since last system reset.

item.name: totalInboundBlocked
item.description: Total number of inbound messages blocked since last system reset.

item.name: totalInboundQuarantined
item.description: Total number of inbound messages quarantined since last system reset.

item.name: totalInboundRateControlled
item.description: Total number of inbound messages deferred due to Rate Control since last system reset.

item.name: totalInboundTagged
item.description: Total number of inbound messages tagged since last system reset.

item.name: totalInboundVirusBlocked
item.description: Total number of inbound messages blocked due to viruses since last system reset.

item.name: totalOutboundPolicyBlocked
item.description: Total number of outbound messages blocked due to policy since last system reset.

item.name: totalOutboundQuarantined
item.description: Number of outbound messages quarantined since last system reset.

item.name: totalOutboundRateControlled
item.description: Total number of outbound messages deferred due to Rate Control since last system reset.

item.name: totalOutboundSpamBlocked
item.description: Total number of outbound messages blocked due to spam since last system reset.

item.name: totalOutboundVirusBlocked
item.description: Total number of outbound messages blocked due to viruses sincelast system reset.

item.name: totalRedirected
item.description: Number of messages redirected to another mail server since last system reset.

item.name: totalSent
item.description: Number of outbound messages delivered to the intended recipient, without modification, since last system reset.

item.name: uniqueRecipients
item.description: Number of unique recipients of mail processed by the Barracuda Spam Firewall.

item_prototype.name: Admin status of interface $1
item_prototype.description: The desired state of the interface.

item_prototype.name: Description of interface $1
item_prototype.description: A textual string containing information about the interface. This string should include the name of the manufacturer, the product name and the version of the interface hardware/software.

item_prototype.name: Inbound errors on interface $1
item_prototype.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.

item_prototype.name: Incoming traffic on interface $1
item_prototype.description: The number of octets in valid MAC frames received on this interface, including the MAC header and FCS.

item_prototype.name: Operational status of interface $1
item_prototype.description: The current operational state of the interface.

item_prototype.name: Outbound errors on interface $1
item_prototype.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that could not be transmitted because of errors. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that could not be transmitted because of errors.

item_prototype.name: Outgoing traffic on interface $1
item_prototype.description: The number of octets transmitted in MAC frames on this interface, including the MAC header and FCS.
